h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: When the Red Loong finally falls as you explode his pots for good, you’ll earn plenty of rewards, including a Loong Pearl, Mind Core, 3 Silk, 1376 Will, and 1652 Experience. In addition to this, you can find a gold chest nearby that contains a Boshan Censer curio, and a Thunder Tail weapon material — one of two Loong materials needed to craft the Loongwreathe Staff!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
When the Red Loong finally falls as you explode his pots for good, you’ll earn plenty of rewards, including a Loong Pearl, Mind Core, 3 Silk, 1376 Will, and 1652 Experience. In addition to this, you can find a gold chest nearby that contains a Boshan Censer curio, and a Thunder Tail weapon material — one of two Loong materials needed to craft the Loongwreathe Staff!
